column4: Hi all. Can someone help me install this software: http://savi.sourceforge.net/ I have installed dependencies I think, I get this when running make: http://pastebin.com/m38b4e231
Please someone help with software installation, compiling and all that, see above post
not sure, I was expecting something from the tcl/tk stuff. Might be wrong with those
hmm. i installed tcl and tk and tcl-dev and tk-dev and stuff...
which folks would just provide debs!
try a few local ones out?
I'd try the tkchooser then, seems closest :)
bad choice, tkchooser isn't the package you want. It was one of the !found ones

yeah, those both sound like they would work. The former would be easiest for me

welcome to compiling code in linux. Not uncommon to tweak stuff to a distribution
